title: Esketamine: Postmarketing Safety Concerns
itunes:title: Esketamine: Postmarketing Safety Concerns
description:
How risky is esketamine? In this episode, we examine the safety of esketamine using postmarketing data that have been reported since the drug was approved and released.

Faculty: Jim Phelps, M.D.
Hosts: Jessica Diaz, M.D.; Flavio Guzman, M.D.

  • Learn more about our memberships here
  • Earn 0.5 CMEs: Quick Take Vol. 27
  • Postmarketing Safety Concerns With Esketamine: A Disproportionality Analysis of Spontaneous Reports Submitted to the FDA Adverse Event Reporting System
